title: Spicy cabbage and tomato salad
ingredients: ['150g cabbage, finely chopped', '4 large firm tomatoes, chopped', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '2 green chillies, seeded and finely chopped', 'salt to taste', 'caster sugar to taste', '1 tablespoon coarsely ground roasted peanuts', '1 tablespoon ghee (clarified butter)', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '25g fresh coriander, chopped']
